rows.label: qev013903_MSG0001
rows.name:
So that damned woman made her move...
She'll pay for this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0002
rows.name:
Ah, if it isn't our little xeno lover.
Come to end the life of a fellow human, traitor?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_JNK0010
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev013903_SEL0011
rows.name: Explain to Alex that Eliza asked you to come in peace.

rows.label: qev013903_JNK0020
rows.name: Convince

rows.label: qev013903_SEL0021
rows.name: Persuade Alex to stop his crimes and turn himself in.

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0003
rows.name:
I had hoped we might be fast friends. That you might
have the wisdom to see things as they truly are.
It seems I was mistaken.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0004
rows.name:
Look at you... Nothing but a sniveling cur in service to
that idiot woman.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0005
rows.name: Crime? And what crime have I committed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0006
rows.name:
I have done nothing less than save all humanity from
becoming a race of slaves. I am no criminal...
I am a HERO![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0008
rows.name:
Ah! Welcome, [ST:gender p1=brother p2=sister ]!
Have you come to offer your assistance again?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0013
rows.name:
But if you wish to discuss the matter, I am agreeable.
Reasoned debate has always been one of humanity's
greatest hallmarks, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0014
rows.name:
If you can convince me that your claim is correct,
I will acknowledge defeat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0015
rows.name:
And in that case, you will be allowed to walk away in
peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0016
rows.name: I'll even have my colleagues stand down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_JNK0110
rows.name: Contend

rows.label: qev013903_SEL0111
rows.name: Assert that not all xenoforms are hostile.

rows.label: qev013903_JNK0120
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev013903_SEL0121
rows.name: Ask Alex why he can't compromise with xenoforms.

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0017
rows.name: Have you forgotten what happened to Earth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0018
rows.name:
Those xeno swine turned Earth into a battlefield...
They destroyed our planet![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0019
rows.name:
Nearly 10 billion men and women died, and I will
not forget OR forgive their senseless slaughter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0020
rows.name:
These Ma-non are no different than the xenos who
ruined Earth, and they will destroy New LA if we do
not stop them now. Surely you must see this. Unless...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0021
rows.name:
Unless they have already brainwashed you with their
insidious alien technology![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0022
rows.name:
Compromise? COMPROMISE?! Compromise with the
vermin that came stomping into OUR city?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0023
rows.name:
I might as well compromise with the cockroach that
lives in my pantry![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0024
rows.name:
How exactly would you propose I compromise with
these interlopers? Hmm? With the xeno plague that
invaded our city for their own selfish gain?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_JNK0210
rows.name: Cite an Example

rows.label: qev013903_SEL0211
rows.name:
Say that the arms manufacturers
prove interspecies cooperation.

rows.label: qev013903_JNK0220
rows.name: Rebut

rows.label: qev013903_SEL0221
rows.name: Tell Alex that his beliefs do not justify violence.

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0025
rows.name:
A fine collaboration for now. But do you really think
that partnership will last forever?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0026
rows.name:
Look at Earth's history. Even when it was just us
humans, we still fought a string of endless wars.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0027
rows.name:
We shared biology. Learned each other's languages.
And even with all that, peace never lasted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0028
rows.name:
This dream of peaceful understanding between alien
races with no such common ground is ludicrous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0029
rows.name:
Even now, they fail to understand us. They cannot
even fathom why they find themselves in this
current predicament![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0030
rows.name: Have you heard nothing I've said?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0031
rows.name:
These creatures will rise up and steal what is ours.
They'll have us in chains before we know it!
I will not allow that to happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0032
rows.name: Well then? What specious claim will you make next?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_JNK0310
rows.name: Persist

rows.label: qev013903_SEL0311
rows.name: Try to convince Alex that humans cannot survive alone.

rows.label: qev013903_JNK0320
rows.name: Fight

rows.label: qev013903_SEL0321
rows.name: Accept that words are futile, and stop Alex by force.

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0033
rows.name: You honestly feel these xenos are so great an asset?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0034
rows.name:
...I will concede that without their assistance,
New LA might have fallen by now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0035
rows.name: But that doesn't... No. Am I...wrong...after all?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0036
rows.name: ...Pffaaa ha ha! Aaah ha ha ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0037
rows.name: Rrrgh! I should have known you'd be watching...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0038
rows.name: No! It's you who are the fool![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0039
rows.name:
Have you ever truly stared into the darkness
within them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0040
rows.name:
Xenos kill! They pillage! They care about nothing but
their own selfish desires![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0041
rows.name:
All xenos are the same! None of them will ever be true
brothers and sisters of humanity![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0042
rows.name:
And if you and Eliza refuse to see that, then I name
you my enemies as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0043
rows.name:
So you turn to force after all.
What would dear Eliza think, I wonder?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0044
rows.name:
Worry not, friend. I, at least, understand your course.
For fear of death is the only force capable of making
this world pure![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0045
rows.name: Ngh... Enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0046
rows.name: I yield for today, but know that I will not be stopped.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0047
rows.name:
It matters not what temporary profits this xeno
infestation may offer New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0048
rows.name:
There can be no surrender, no rest, until every last one
of them has been chased from our streets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0049
rows.name: Ngh... Enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0050
rows.name: I yield for today, but know that I will not be stopped.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0051
rows.name:
The time will come when I see the last of those
xeno interlopers snuffed out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013903_MSG0052
rows.name:
Tell Eliza that if she persists in interfering,
I will do what I must. Farewell.[ST:wait ]
